ComicInfo.Summary: Every story has it's ending.: Ed finds the latest person who has been tagged and it's a little girl named Emily. He struggles with whether or not to kill her and is obviously getting crazier. Using the dreams he has had, he lures her to a bomb shelterr and locks her in. He then imagines that his life becomes wonderful, Elizabeth is cured of being crazy and is living with him again. In reality, he has suffered a nervous breakdown outside the bomb shelter. Two policemen find him there and are about to take him in when they hear a sound at the door. They open the door and Emily says, "Tag! You're it!"
ComicInfo.Title: Every story has it's ending.
